sentences.cn: 孩子们喜欢在户外玩耍.

sentences.en: He is a keen outdoors man with a great interest in photography and walking.
sentences.cn: 他非常喜欢户外运动,酷爱摄影和徒步旅行.

sentences.en: I'm a lover of the outdoors.
It was warm enough to be outdoors all afternoon.
sentences.cn: 天气很暖和，整个下午都可以呆在户外。

sentences.en: It was winter outdoors, but spring indoors.
sentences.cn: 院子里是冬天, 屋子里是春天.

sentences.en: It's as cool as a cucumber outdoors.
It's great to work outdoors during brisk fall days.
sentences.cn: 清爽的秋日里在户外工作是很愉快的.

sentences.en: It’s warm enough to eat outdoors tonight.
sentences.cn: 今晚很暖和，可以在户外用餐。

sentences.en: Outdoors, mosquitoes and midges were a perpetual torment.
sentences.cn: 在户外，蚊子和蠓虫永远让人不得安生。

sentences.en: She is an avid outdoors woman.

sentences.cn: 她每天下午都在户外搞园艺.

sentences.en: That hunter has a ruddy face because he is outdoors so much.
sentences.cn: 那个猎人脸色红润,因为他长期待在户外.

sentences.en: The ceremony was being held outdoors.
The rain prevented them from eating outdoors.
sentences.cn: 雨天使他们无法户外用餐。

sentences.en: The weather made it unfeasible to be outdoors.

words.tran_cn: 户外的；露天的；野外的（等于out-of-door）
户外的，爱好野外活动的；适用于户外的

trans.tran_en: the countryside far away from buildings and cities
